title: A U.N. team enters Gaza's Al-Shifa Hospital and finds a death zone

title: Biden will push China to resume military ties with US, official says

title: Rosalynn Carter, outspoken former first lady, dies at 96
description: Former first lady Rosalynn Carter has died at the age of 96. The Carter Center in Atlanta announced that the wife of former President Jimmy Carter died Sunday afternoon at her home in Plains, Georgia.

title: Every move I make, I second guess: These Muslim and Arab Americans say the surge in hate has made them more vigilant - CNN
description: CNN recently asked Arabs, Muslims and Jews in America how they are facing the new reality of hate-motivated attacks against their communities. Nearly 800 people responded from across the country. These are their stories.

title: Arrest made in death of Jewish protester who fell and hit his head - CNN

title: Tim Scott says he's suspending his presidential campaign - ABC News
description: Scott made the announcement on Trey Gowdy's show.

title: Republican Sen. Tim Scott suspends presidential campaign - CNN
description: Tim Scott of South Carolina is ending his presidential campaign, he announced in an interview with Fox News on Sunday.
